author: jacobkaufmann
content: This is on the page that Piper sent, but just in case you missed it, there is a rust implementation maintained by sigma prime: https://docs.rs/eth2_ssz/0.3.0/ssz/

author: cheechyuan.eth
content: you could look into my repo https://github.com/chee-chyuan/accumulator_v3  . where i used List and Containers

author: potuz
content:
Here's the list of implementations, depending on the language you're more familiar with, you'll be better off looking directly at that code than trying to implement it yourself. 
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/2138
